Factor is well supported on both sides of the border. "I know from my experience of the Young Star Search there is no shortage of talent in Northern Ireland," he said. There will potentially be no representation from Ireland, north or south, which is a bit rich given how loyal people here are to the show. Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg.

Asset Relief Program, the U.S. Treasury can restrict senior management's compensation. "It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly," CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call. The obligation to our people was much greater than the need to improve our bottom-line profitability. Sergio Marchionne chose the term performance award rather than profit sharing because "it's difficult to talk about profit sharing when you have a negative number at the bottom line."
